name: Hook 'N' Slice
description:
Shoot a harpoon through enemies reel them in and decapitate them!

Play as an unnamed protagonist in a dungeon themed first person retro billboard shooter where you shoot a harpoon hook that bounces off surfaces and through enemies to reel them in so you can kill them with your sword.

Find keys to open the doors and kill the final boss.

Controls:

WASD  -  move
Left click  -  shoot/recall hook
Right click  -  swing sword
Left Shift  -  sprint
